Metadata.siteDescription: A 4★ boutique countryside hotel set in a beautifully restored 19th-century farmhouse, surrounded by pine trees at the foot of the mountains.

Home.heroSubtitle: A peaceful retreat in the heart of the countryside
Home.introText: A beautifully restored 19th-century farmhouse, thoughtfully converted into a 4★ boutique countryside hotel set among pine trees at the foot of the mountains.
Home.introParagraph:
The original character of the property has been carefully preserved, with traditional architecture and rural details complemented by modern comforts and contemporary design. The result is a calm, welcoming retreat that feels both authentic and refined.

Guests can enjoy La Ruta, our on-site restaurant, offering relaxed dining in a warm and social setting. Outside, the property opens onto well-maintained gardens, outdoor seating areas, and a swimming pool, providing space to unwind, socialise, or simply enjoy the peaceful surroundings.

With on-site parking, generous communal areas, and a setting that invites both rest and exploration, The Pines Hotel is an ideal base for guests looking to experience the Spanish countryside in comfort and style.

Rooms.title: Our Rooms
Rooms.subtitle: Carefully designed spaces combining comfort and elegance

benicarlo.name: Benicarlo
benicarlo.shortDescription: Our Double Rooms offer a calm and comfortable retreat, blending traditional countryside charm with modern design details.
benicarlo.longDescription:
Our Double Rooms offer a calm and comfortable retreat, blending traditional countryside charm with modern design details.

Each room features warm, natural tones, soft lighting, and carefully chosen furnishings that reflect the rural setting of The Pines Hotel. Original features sit comfortably alongside contemporary comforts, creating a relaxed and welcoming space to unwind.
features: Comfortable double bed with quality linens
En-suite bathroom with walk-in shower or bath tub
Chic design with a traditional countryside feel

la-mina.name: La Mina
la-mina.shortDescription: Our Double Rooms offer an authentic countryside retreat, full of rustic charm and traditional character.
la-mina.longDescription:
Our Double Rooms offer an authentic countryside retreat, full of rustic charm and traditional character.

Exposed wooden ceiling beams, terracotta tiled floors, and thick whitewashed walls create a warm and inviting atmosphere that reflects the heritage of the surrounding landscape. Rich natural textures and handcrafted details blend effortlessly with subtle modern comforts, offering a space that feels both timeless and comfortable.

The room features a welcoming double bed dressed in quality linens, soft ambient lighting, and carefully chosen furnishings that complement the rural setting. The en-suite bathroom continues the traditional feel, with classic tiling, character features, and a walk-in shower or bath tub.
features: Comfortable double bed with quality linens
En-suite bathroom with walk-in shower or bath tub
Traditional design with authentic rural character

almenara.name: Almenara
almenara.shortDescription: Our Superior Double / Twin Rooms offer an enhanced sense of space and comfort, blending traditional countryside charm with refined modern design details.
almenara.longDescription:
Our Superior Double / Twin Rooms offer an enhanced sense of space and comfort, blending traditional countryside charm with refined modern design details.

Generously sized and thoughtfully designed, these rooms feature warm, natural tones, soft ambient lighting, and carefully selected furnishings that reflect the rural setting of The Pines Hotel. Original architectural features sit seamlessly alongside contemporary comforts, creating an elegant yet relaxed space to truly unwind.

The larger layout includes an expanded bathroom and the choice of a spacious king-size/twin bed, making it ideal for couples, friends, or solo travellers seeking extra room to relax.
features: Spacious king-size/twin bed option with quality linens
Large en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower
Chic design with a traditional countryside feel

the-red-sand-suite.name: The Red Sand Suite
the-red-sand-suite.shortDescription: Our Suites provide extra space and comfort, designed for guests who appreciate a little more room to relax.
the-red-sand-suite.longDescription:
Our Suites provide extra space and comfort, designed for guests who appreciate a little more room to relax.

Featuring distinct sleeping and living areas, the Suites combine elegant, modern styling with traditional architectural details. Natural textures, warm colours, and soft furnishings create a refined yet relaxed atmosphere — perfect for longer stays or guests seeking added comfort.
features: Separate living area with sofa seating
En-suite bathroom with walk-in shower and bubble tub
Stylish décor inspired by the surrounding countryside

cdg-retreat.name: CDG Retreat
cdg-retreat.shortDescription: Our Family Room offers a spacious and private layout, thoughtfully designed for families who want to stay together while enjoying a little extra separation.
cdg-retreat.longDescription:
Our Family Room offers a spacious and private layout, thoughtfully designed for families who want to stay together while enjoying a little extra separation.

The room is arranged as one private unit, split into two distinct sleeping areas, providing comfort and privacy for parents and children within the same space. Traditional countryside features are paired with chic design elements, warm lighting, and modern comforts to create a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere.
features: En-suite bathroom with shower and bath tub
Traditional rural character with modern amenities

Dine.title: La Ruta Restaurant
Dine.subtitle: Relaxed dining in a warm and social atmosphere
Dine.description: Our on-site restaurant La Ruta offers a warm, social dining experience in a countryside setting. We celebrate local flavors and seasonal ingredients, creating a culinary experience that complements the peaceful surroundings.
Dine.welcomeDescription: Our chef sources local ingredients from nearby farms and producers, celebrating the flavors of the region. Whether it's a leisurely breakfast, relaxed lunch, or intimate dinner, La Ruta provides the perfect setting for culinary experiences that honor both tradition and contemporary taste.
Dine.localCuisineDescription: Seasonal menus featuring regional specialties and local producers
Dine.wineSelectionDescription: Curated wines from Spanish vineyards and international producers
Dine.socialDiningDescription: Intimate atmosphere perfect for meeting other guests or private celebrations
Dine.reservationInfo: For reservations and special dietary requirements, please contact us

Terms.title: Terms & Conditions
Terms.subtitle: Please read our terms and conditions carefully
Terms.heading: Terms and Conditions
Terms.welcome: Welcome to The Pines Hotel. Please read our terms and conditions carefully before making a reservation. By making a reservation, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
reservationsList: All reservations are subject to availability.
Reservations can be made online through our website, by phone, or by email.
A valid credit card is required to guarantee your reservation.
Special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges.
checkInList: Check-in time is from 3:00 PM on the day of arrival.
Check-out time is by 12:00 PM on the day of departure.
Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges.
Guests are required to present a valid photo ID and the credit card used for the reservation upon check-in.
cancellationList: Cancellations made more than 7 days prior to the arrival date will receive a full refund.
Cancellations made within 7 days of the arrival date will be charged for the first night of the stay.
No-shows will be charged for the entire reservation.
For group reservations, a different cancellation policy may apply. Please contact us for more information.
paymentList: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and cash.
Full payment is required upon check-in.
All prices are in Euros (€) and include applicable taxes.
behaviorList: Guests are expected to behave in a respectful and responsible manner at all times.
Smoking is not permitted in any indoor areas of the hotel. A cleaning fee will be charged for smoking in the rooms.
Pets are not allowed, with the exception of service animals.
Any damage to hotel property will be charged to the guest's credit card.
liabilityList: The Pines Hotel is not responsible for any lost, stolen, or damaged personal belongings.
The hotel is not liable for any accidents or injuries that occur on the premises.
Guests are responsible for their own safety and security.
Terms.privacyText: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy for more information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
Terms.contactText: If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us:
Terms.addressDetails: The Pines Hotel, Ctra Els Ivarsos a Culla KM1, Castellon, Valencia, Spain

Cookies.title: Cookies Policy
Cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies
Cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
Cookies.welcome: Welcome to The Pines Hotel. This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.
Cookies.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.
Cookies.howWeUseCookiesText: We use a minimal number of cookies on our website. We do not use cookies to collect personal information or to track your browsing habits. The cookies we use are for essential functionallity only.
Cookies.essentialCookiesText: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Cookies.thirdPartyCookiesText: We do not use any third-party cookies for advertising or tracking purposes.
Cookies.yourChoicesText: Because we only use essential cookies, there is no mechanism for you to opt-out of them, other than to cease using the website, or to configure your browser to block cookies. However, as stated above, this may affect the functionality of the website.
Cookies.contactText: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

Footer.copyright: The Pines Hotel. All rights reserved.
